description: Gets the sessions stored in the memory of the agent.

parameters.name: agentAliasId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an alias of an agent.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent to which the alias belongs.

parameters.name: memoryId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the memory.

nested_items.name: memoryContents
nested_items.description: Contains details of the sessions stored in the memory.

nested_items.name: memoryId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the memory where the session summary is stored.

nested_items.name: sessionExpiryTime
nested_items.description: The time when the memory duration for the session is set to end.

nested_items.name: sessionStartTime
nested_items.description: The start time for this session.

nested_items.name: summaryText
nested_items.description: The summarized text for this session.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxItems value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.
